column5: Got a late start yesterday and the bite lasted maybe an hour but the lady friend got herself into a big GBay laker       Long weekend traffic out there was crazy.  Also got stopped by a CO checking licenses, had a quick chat, talked some fishing and he was on his way. 34inches on the tape.
Nice fish i don't remember seeing a laker picture from that area. I was around Honey Harbour yesterday the wake from all the boats made travelling a little bumpy but all the sunshine made up for it.
The channel from HH, north through Tomahawk island can be insane.   if I fish that area, I'm out before the sun comes up, lol!      Lots of lakers in GBay, even down the HH way.
Nice one Bill! I never think of Trout when I think of HH area, but obviously they are there!
That’s a dream fish for me. Well done
I wonder how old that laker is. Looks healthy, they can probably get bigger. great catch.
Awesome Bill and Mrs Bill! And yeah, the boat traffic was nuts this weekend.
nice fish.. its true often forget about em in huron
That right there is a great fish....congrats
